SegmentFlag.description: This type shall contain a single segment flag in a lock request
SegmentFlag.longDescription: This type shall contain a single segment flag structure in a management console lock request

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

LockFlag.description: This property represents the multilevel lockflag in the lock request
LockFlag.longDescription: This property help represent the multilevel locking mechanism, This can either be LockAll or LockSame or DontLock

SegmentLength.description: This property would represent the segment length in a single lock record
SegmentLength.longDescription: This property shall contain the segment length which is used to interpret the resourceID with a specified byte length for conflict checking

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SegmentFlags.description: This entity type represents a set of segment flags
SegmentFlags.longDescription: This entity type represents a set of segment flags that are present in a sigle lock request.
